meanings.sent1: The school misenrolled the student in the wrong class.
meanings.sent2: She realized she had misenrolled in the art course instead of music.
meanings.sent3: The computer system must have misenrolled me in gym class, but I can't even do a push-up!
meanings.sent4: Being misenrolled felt like trying to fit a square peg into a round hole.
meanings.sent5: The confusion from being misenrolled made the first day of school unforgettable.

meanings.sent1: The misenrolled student had to switch schedules.
meanings.sent2: She felt out of place being misenrolled in the advanced math class.
meanings.sent3: It was a misenrolled mix-up that led to the wrong student receiving the award.
meanings.sent4: The misenrolled student stood out like a sore thumb in the drama club.
meanings.sent5: The misenrolled label made her feel like a fish out of water in the science fair.
